name: Add new RepairShopr customers to Google Sheets
description: Every time a new customer is added to RepairShopr, Make will automatically add the customer information to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qCUudNl-Lr43fd_buiYRq_5HPifLEl64xEMhQ-mHSZ4/edit?usp=sharing).
